system.description:
Summons an undine, an elemental of water, under the caster's control. There must be a large enough pool of water in the area to allow the undine to manifest. While the spell lasts the undine will follow the caster's commands; once the spell ends the undine dissipates back into the water.

Your GM will have details of undines. Each success in the margin will add one dice to one of the undine's Resistances or Abilities.
